text: Thomas A. Pankok (July 9, 1931 â€“ January 31, 2022) was an American Democratic Party politician. He was in the New Jersey General Assembly from 1982 to 1986. Pankok was born in Salem, New Jersey. Pankok died on January 31, 2022 in Mannington Township, New Jersey at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from New Jersey Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Thomas A. Pankok
